<color_dark_gray>* This stuff makes you think you are mentally retarded. Intelligence-3 
* The two small holes can't see clearly. Perception-3
* 这玩意碍手矮脚的 敏捷-3 速度-20</color>  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Before the end, the pain is still there, stay optimistic, and smile.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
